Please Note: 2.4Ghz wireless devices, such as wireless keyboard and mouse adapters, may not work in close proximity to USB 3.0 devices or hubs. Connecting to a USB 2.0 port is recommended. Ensure that the adapter is connected before using this hub. And for best performance please connect it to the USB 3.0 port of your PC."
